item.title: Comment policy
item.description: Welcome to my simple little site. The posts I make here will contain code, links to code, and thoughts about code and technology. I’m not omniscient and I certainly am not an expert in any field, so I’ve enabled comments on my posts to let any readers comment on the posts to provide corrections or findings of their own. The best environment for working in tech is a learning-friendly environment, I’ve found.
